channel.title: Creating Custom Items?
channel.description: I need to know how to do this. I know there's a program you need to download, but I can't seem to find it on the site. Can someone please help me? Thanks. :)

item.title: Creating Custom Items?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:3, topic:339862”]Download the custom item, put the models in the models folder in the client. Then, copy the ints and paste them in class9 I think. Then, finally, go on your server and type in add model without the ‘:’ then the # of the model.

add model ####

Nope, also I’ll just re explain you.
1:Download the Item/object/npc model.
2:Post the models in the model folder, and the ints in either class5.java class8.java and or class44.java.
3:Save complie + restart client.
4:Go into game and do “add model ####”
5:Restart client if needed.
6:Step done.
It should work now.

Read full topic

add model ####

I know that, but I want to “create” a custom items. I used to do it in the past but completely forgot the names of the programs I used.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Custom Items?
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

So, exactly what now? You have many options when you say “Creating Custom Items”

  1. Recolor items and change the names.
  2. Add Newer Version Items.
  3. Metasopia or something like this, or other 3D Programs (Sorry, but hell I haven’t been interested in Servers in a year.)
    *4. You’ll need both a Source and A Client.

Read full topic
